DataElement.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify the parent substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Something from which one or more similar and separate things have developed, or to which they are attached._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._A brief description given for purposes of identification; an identifying or descriptive marker that is attached to an object.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Something from which one or more similar and separate things have developed, or to which they are attached.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Concepts.definition: Something from which one or more similar and separate things have developed, or to which they are attached.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: A brief description given for purposes of identification; an identifying or descriptive marker that is attached to an object.

Concepts.definition: A brief description given for purposes of identification; an identifying or descriptive marker that is attached to an object.
